data.title: Holiday - Premier Charter Bus & Tours in North Carolina
data.meta_description: Holiday Companies is a family-owned & operated charter bus & tour company. We focus on an unbeatable combination of Quality, Value & Personalized Service.
data.text:
Holiday Companies, founded in 1978 by Nancy and Dwight Thompson, is a family owned and operated organization, offering a wide variety of motorcoach and air packages throughout North America and abroad.

We concentrate on an unbeatable combination of:

Holiday Companies, centrally located near Greensboro, NC, provides the finest in Motorcoach Service in North Carolina, South Carolina and Virginia.

SAFETY - Our #1 Priority

Here at Holiday Tours we take pride in keeping the best DOT Safety Rating available.

We hold the highest rating available which is Satisfactory as provided by the DOT.

The US Department of Transportation also performs inspections where they assign ratings of Satisfactory, Conditional, and Unconditional, we have maintained a Satisfactory rating since we began.

Our goal is to provide you with the safest trip possible. For this reason, we have company policies and procedures in place to protect both you, our customer, and our employees that are on the road with you. Our helpful staff will be glad to help explain some of these policies if they affect one of your tours.
